alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Hawkins; Sullivan (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 31 at 11:02PM CDT until August 01 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM EDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of east Tennessee, including the following counties, Hancock, Hawkins and Sullivan. Portions of southwest Virginia, including the following counties and independent city, City of Bristol, Scott and Washington. * WHEN...Until 300 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1202 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Kingsport, Bristol Tn, Bristol Va, Abingdon, Rogersville, Gate City, Surgoinsville, Weber City, Colonial Heights, Walnut Hill, Church Hill, Mount Carmel, Bloomingdale, Hiltons, Warriors Path State Park, Sullivan Gardens, Bays Mountain Park, Blountville, Okolona and Benhams. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
